attributes.action: give a lower tax on cars to people that share cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if you can have a greener car you pay lower road tax, so if you share a car why do you not have lower tax? I think that you should be able to apply for a liscense to prove that you share a vehicle on the way to work and if approved you have a 2.5% road tax reduction
